1   package org.lindbergframework.persistence.beans;
2   
3   import java.sql.ResultSet;
4   import java.sql.SQLException;
5   
6   import org.lindbergframework.exception.BeanPopulateException;
7   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.ResultDataSet;
8   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.RowDataTree;
9   import org.springframework.jdbc.core.RowMapper;
10  
11  /**
12   * MultiLevelsBeanPopulator extension that implements {@link RowMapper} interface
13   * to work with Procedure and Function cursors.
14   * 
15   * @author Victor Lindberg
16   *
17   */
18  public class MultiLevelBeanRowMapperForProcedureCursor extends MultLevelsBeanPopulator implements RowMapper{
19  	
20      /**
21       * Bean class to populate.
22       */
23  	private Class clazz;
24  	
25  	public MultiLevelBeanRowMapperForProcedureCursor(Class clazz) {
26  		this.clazz = clazz;
27  	}
28  
29  
30  	/**
31  	 * Executes the mult level population for {@link ResultSet} argument
32  	 * creating and populating the bean.
33  	 */
34  	public Object mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
35  		try {
36  			ResultDataSet dataSet = new ResultDataSet(rs);
37  			return populate(clazz, new RowDataTree(dataSet));
38  		} catch (BeanPopulateException e) {
39  			throw new SQLException(e.getMessage());
40  		}
41      }
42  }
